item.description:
Become certified to give the gift of Reiki to friends, family, pets or clients and yourself. Reiki is easy to learn and is an effective hands-on healing modality to bring peace to body, mind, spirit. You will receive a notebook and four Reiki attunements. Class covers history of Reiki, hand positions, practice sessions, ethics, how to begin a practice. Contact Judy at 781-639-1236 if you would like to join this class. The class is being held  from 9:30 am - 3:30 pm . This is traditional Usui Reiki and you will be fully certified at the end of the class.  If you want you may volunteer at the monthly Reiki clinic held at A Higher Balance to practice on clients.

During this class you will receive the sacred initiation to the Healer's Rites of the Munay-Ki.

Registration and deposit are required.  Please contact Judy 781-639-1236.
item.name: Reiki First Degree Certification Training
